def in_bathroom(sink: item):
    # Determine whether the sink is in the bathroom
    symbol in_bathroom=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(sink, room)
    return in_bathroom

behavior wash_shirt_in_sink(shirt: item, sink: item):
    body:
        # Place the shirt inside the sink
        achieve inside(shirt, sink)

        # If the sink has a faucet, turn it on and then wash the shirt
        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            wash(shirt)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        else:
            wash(shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select the shirt to be washed

        if exists sink: item where: is_sink(sink) and in_bathroom(sink):
            # If a bathroom sink is available, use it for washing
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and in_bathroom(sink)
            wash_shirt_in_sink(shirt, sink)
        else:
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    observe(sink, "Check if the sink is in the bathroom and has a faucet")

def is_dirty_clothes(item:item):
    # Check if the item is a dirty piece of clothing
    symbol is_clothes=is_clothes(item) and dirty(item)
    return is_clothes

def is_washable(item:item):
    # Check if the item can be washed
    symbol washable_item=is_clothes(item)
    return washable_item

behavior wash_dirty_clothes(item:item, sink:item):
    # Define the behavior to wash a piece of dirty clothing in the sink
    body:
        achieve inside(item, sink)
        # Place the clothing item in the sink

        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # Turn on the faucet if its near the sink
        
        scrub(item)
        rinse(item)
        
        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # Turn off the faucet after washing

        # Bind the shirt to wash
        bind sink: item where:

        # Bind a sink
        wash_dirty_clothes(clothes, sink)

        achieve dirty(shirt)
        # Ensure the shirt is dirty at the beginning of the task

        achieve_once inside(shirt, sink)
        # Place the shirt inside the sink

        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)

        achieve has_water(sink)
        # Ensure there is water inside the sink

        scrub(shirt) # Scrubbing the shirt as part of the washing process
        rinse(shirt) # Rinsing the shirt in the sink
        squeeze(shirt) # Squeezing out the excess water from the shirt

        if is_faucet(sink):

                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # Turn the faucet off after washing

        # Ensure the shirt is clean at the end of the task

        # Ensure the shirt is wet at the end of the washing process

def is_clothes_clean(clothes:item):
    # Function to check if clothes are clean
    symbol clean_status=clean(clothes)
    return clean_status

behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item, iron:item, ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board) # Place the shirt on the ironing board
        achieve plugged(iron) # Plug in the iron
        achieve is_on(iron) # Turn on the iron
        achieve is_clothes_shirt(shirt) # Start ironing the shirt

behavior close_the_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        achieve unplugged(iron)
        achieve is_off(iron)

        bind shirt: item where:

        # Select an iron

            is_ironing_board(ironing_board) 
        # Select an ironing board
        iron_shirt(shirt, iron, ironing_board)
        close_the_iron(iron)

        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board)
        # Place the shirt on the ironing board
        achieve is_on(iron)
        # Turn on the iron for use

def has_ironed_shirt(ironing_board:item):
    # Function to check if there is an ironed shirt on a specified ironing board
    symbol has_ironed_shirt=exists o: item : is_clothes_shirt(o) and on(o, ironing_board)
    return has_ironed_shirt

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select the ironing board
        
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select the iron

        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select the shirt

        achieve plugged(iron) # Ensure the iron is plugged in
        achieve is_on(iron) # Ensure the iron is on

        if not has_ironed_shirt(ironing_board):
            # If the shirt is not yet ironed, achieve it on the ironing board
            achieve on(shirt, ironing_board)

        achieve plugged(iron)
        achieve is_on(iron)
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board)

def on_ironing_board(x: item, board: item):

    return ready

Goal Representation:
behavior set_up_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        achieve plugged(iron)
        achieve is_on(iron)

behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item, ironing_board:item, iron:item):
    body:
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board)
        achieve close(iron, shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and clean(shirt)
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        set_up_iron(iron)
        iron_shirt(shirt, ironing_board, iron)
